text: My rozdilyly yikh u dvanadtsyat聞 tribal spil聞noty, ta my nadykhnuly Moses koly yoho lyudy poprosyly yoho dlya vody: "Vrazyty skelyu z vashym personalom," whereupon dvanadtsyat聞 pruzhyn khlynutykh zvidty. Otzhe, kozhna spil聞nota znala yoho vodu. Ta my shaded yim z khmaramy, ta poslanymy vnyz yim manna ta quails: "Z'yizhte z harnykh rechey my yakshcho dlya vas." Tse - ne ny shcho vony obrazyly; tse - vony kotri obrazyly yikhni vlasni dushi
